definition[0]: to use all your determination to continue in spite of difficulties
example[0]: Just grit your teeth and hang on – it’ll be over soon.
definition[1]: to bite your teeth together, especially when you are in pain, angry, or under pressure
example[1]: Ben gritted his teeth, hoping Sasha wouldn’t notice his fear.
example[2]: ‘No, that’s alright, ’ she said through gritted teeth.
